name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Zon - Amazon Filter by Number of Reviews

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Better purchases in less time! Filter results by minimum number of reviews to quickly find the tried and true products on Amazon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use this to avoid analysis paralysis when searching for generic items on Amazon. In my personal experience, when there are too many options on an Amazon results page, the most effective way to make a decision is to ignore products with a low number of reviews. It's tedious to use brain power for this. It's also a good way to avoid new items that have fake reviews.

This extension automatically filters out products with low number of reviews. You can also add a filter for minimum stars. Hopefully this saves you as much time as it saves me! 

Less time, less crap! 
Happy shopping!
